H0.text: Nurture is the component of animal behavior control that refers to experiences, alongside genetics, known as nature and nurture.

H1.text: Growth is the experiences aspect that, together with genetics, controls animal behavior, also known as nature and growth.

H2.text: Evolution is the term that, along with genetics, describes how animal behavior is controlled by genetics and experiences, also referred to as nature and evolution.

H3.text: Interaction is the term that, together with genetics and experiences, explains the control of animal behavior, also referred to as nature and interaction.

A4.text: Meta-analysis of twin correlations and heritability
